```{r}
Russell %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = ymd(Date), y = Open))+
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
spdata <- spdata %>%
  mutate(name = "sp")
```

```{r}
Russell <- Russell %>%
  mutate(name = "russ")
```


```{r}
both <- spdata %>%
  left_join(Russell,
            by = c("Date" = "Date" )) %>%
  mutate(spclose = Close.x )%>%
  mutate(russclose = Close.y) %>%
  select(Date, spclose, russclose) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = -Date,
               names_to = "Index" ,
             values_to = "Close") 
  
```

```{r}
both %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = ymd(Date), y = Close, color = Index))+
  geom_line()
  
```
